```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

# Load packages

```{r packages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(plyr)
library(googlesheets)
library(stringr)

```

# Read data

```{r read-data, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
review_2017 <- gs_title("2017 review")

q1 <- review_2017 %>%
  gs_read(ws = "Q1",
          range = cell_rows(1:7))

q2 <- review_2017 %>%
  gs_read(ws = "Q2",
          range = cell_rows(1:7))

q3 <- review_2017 %>%
  gs_read(ws = "Q3",
          range = cell_rows(1:7))

q4 <- review_2017 %>%
  gs_read(ws = "Q4",
          range = cell_rows(1:7))
```

# Merge and wrangle data

```{r merge-wrangle}
df_2017 <- join_all(
  list(q1, q2, q3, q4),
  by = "Goal",
  type = "full") %>%
  gather(week, value, -Goal)

df_2017$value <- str_replace_all(df_2017$value, "%", "")
df_2017$value <- as.integer(df_2017$value)

df_2017$week <- str_replace_all(df_2017$week, "w", "")
df_2017$week <- as.integer(df_2017$week)
```

# Plotting

```{r plot}

lineplot <- ggplot(df_2017, aes(x = week, y = value)) + geom_line()

lineplot + facet_grid(. ~ Goal)
```
